pages.title: Bactrian Camel
pages.text: The Bactrian camel ($(o)Camelus bactrianus$()), also known as the Mongolian camel or domestic Bactrian camel, is a large even-toed ungulate native to the steppes of Central Asia.$(br2)It has two humps on its back, in contrast to the single-humped dromedary camel.

pages.title: Bactrian Camel
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cactus$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 13 Days
